author: alexandair
body:
Added newlines following one-sentence-per-line principle.
Fixed typos.

alexandair
comments.body: @vors Those are PRs for two different README.md files. One is docs/releasing/README.md and the other is docs/cmdlet-example/README.md.

title: Update linux.md
